bill.summary:
Fiscal Transparency Act of 2020
This bill requires each federal agency to post annual budget and financial profiles on a public website that is currently maintained by the Department of the Treasury. The profiles must include specified details regarding the mission, organization, activities, statutory authorities, budgetary resources, and financial audits for the agency and each of its components.
